attributes.action: immediately recall our fighting forces from Afghanistan and Iraq because they are there fighting to establish democracy on behalf of a country where there is no longer any democracy at home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nu-Labour has removed the last vestige of democracy in this land by continually refusing to allow the voters a say on how their money should be spent.  It is an immorality that our troops are dying to establish democracy in foreign countries when there is no longer any democracy in their own home country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
